default.subtitle: You can ask anything About Jaldee!

product-enquiry.title: Product Enquiry
product-enquiry.message: How Can I help you today?

options.label: Login issues
options.response: I can help you with login issues. Please describe the problem you're experiencing.

options.label: Payment features
options.response: Our payment system supports multiple methods. What specific payment feature would you like to know about?

options.label: Appointment issues
options.response: I can assist with appointment-related concerns. What issue are you facing?

options.label: Login issues
options.response: I'll help you create a support ticket for login issues. Please provide more details about the problem.

options.label: Payment features
options.response: I'll create a support ticket for payment-related issues. Please describe what you need help with.

options.label: Appointment issues
options.response: I'll help you create a support ticket for appointment issues. What specific problem are you experiencing?

get-quote.title: Get Quote
get-quote.message: I'd be happy to help you get a quote. What service are you interested in?

options.label: Basic Plan
options.response: Great choice! Our Basic Plan starts at $29/month. Would you like me to send you detailed pricing information?

options.label: Premium Plan
options.response: Excellent! Our Premium Plan offers advanced features for $99/month. I can provide you with a custom quote.

options.label: Enterprise Solution
options.response: Perfect! For enterprise solutions, we offer customized pricing. Let me connect you with our sales team.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.message: We'd love to hear your feedback! What would you like to share?

options.label: Positive Feedback
options.response: Thank you for your positive feedback! We really appreciate it.

options.label: Suggestion
options.response: We value your suggestions! Please share your ideas for improvement.

options.label: Report Issue
options.response: I'm sorry to hear about the issue. Please provide details so we can help resolve it.

company-xyz.name: Sarah
company-xyz.subtitle: How can I assist you with XYZ Company today?

book-demo.title: Book Demo
book-demo.message: I'd love to schedule a demo for you! What's your preferred time?

options.label: This week
options.response: Great! I can schedule a demo for this week. What day works best for you?

options.label: Next week
options.response: Perfect! Next week it is. Please let me know your preferred day and time.

tech-support.title: Technical Support
tech-support.message: What technical issue can I help you with?

options.label: API Integration
options.response: I can help with API integration issues. What specific problem are you facing?

options.label: Platform Bug
options.response: I'll help you report a platform bug. Please describe the issue in detail.
